--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "texanworker" <texanworker@a...> wrote:

> Everyone, I'm sorry for wasting bandwidth.  The problem was one
> of the stupid errors that's incredibly obvious after you see it.

Aren't they all ;-)

> the search must see $JUNIT_HOME:$JUNIT_HOME/junit.jar
> in order to find *both* TestRunner and the test classes.

So it was a classpath problem afterall.

> Sorry for having wasted the time and bandwidth.

No worries.

Dave
